data.message: Re- the news feed, when ever I select one of my notifications in my dropdown box, it comes up with an error page telling me that "This page is no longer available" then I select it again and it opens it. Seems I have to open a notification twice before I can read it. Its been happening for months.

replies.message: Hey Cherie. If you believe a feature isn't working properly, you can report it to us by using these steps: http://bit.ly/2crYG64. Thanks! -Jessica
I tried this method and it didn't work for me.

Facebook That method didn't work for me. While I would like to thank the entire facebook staff for having Hillary Clinton's support for presidency, I would like to know how to solve my own technical issue :)
